I don't get people who read humiliation porn and then get so insecure and defensive about it they have to write about how strong and manly they would have acted in that situation. If you're not into getting humiliated you're not supposed to identify with the one getting humliated. You're supposed to identify with the one doing the humliating.

I have a theory that the people who are overly defensive about this kind of stuff, are actually mentally submissive but insecure about it, so they instinctively identify with the submissive character but then feel the need to write something justifying why they actually don't want that.
